attributes.title: Just Bad Quality
attributes.review: I got the app trying to see what things were come to find they are completely against LGBTQ+ rights. Can’t be having that and they had horrible quality photos, completely TRASHED!!!!!!! my phone. Cannot will not. Also gave my phone a virus called WHITE SUPREMACY!

attributes.title: Amazing!!! 10/10
attributes.review: Is app is awesome! 10/10 quality love this app!! Amazing lots of info! Seeing lots of good stuff!

attributes.title: Trash app, trash person!
attributes.review: The app is trash, just like the person it supports. I’m appalled that it’s even allowed to be on the AppStore. It’s a disgrace to all the beautifully well crafted apps on the store. It’s glitchy, it’s hateful, it supports white supremacy. If this is what Apple wants to help represent, I don’t think I want any part of it.

attributes.title: Disappointing.
attributes.review: I was really looking forward to supporting warlord Donald J. Trump, but when I opened the app, it took me straight to videos of naked men. I was going to show my inbred southern children how to support our TOTALLY NOT RACIST OR SEXIST OR PEDOPHILIC supreme leader, and ended up scarring them for their entire short, non-vaccinated lives. Sad. Please remove this bugged app from the App Store.

attributes.title: DO NOT GET
attributes.review: when i made an account something had popped up saying “Vote For Trump or else we will k*ll a fairy.” this message gave my child nightmares, mind you my child is 45 years old. this caused him to imagine pictures of trump k*lling fairies whenever he eats soup(which is his favorite food). you have scared him for life!

attributes.title: I aM fLaBeRgAsTeD
attributes.review: ever since i have downloaded this app all me and my pet pig named shrimp can smell is CHEETO PUFFS🤢🤮 AND everytime i open this app the lice from my little sister finyin’s hair jumps onto my phone until i get out of the app. once i get out of the app the lice go back to their home (my little sisters hair). in conclusion this app is HORRIBLE 🤬

attributes.title: my balls are itching 😿
attributes.review: i downloaded this app hoping to see “GLORIOUS” pictures of the cheeto who runs the country and as soon as i opened the app my balls started itches and so i went to the hospital to get them checked out and it turned out i had 4 different kinds of STDS 😿 so i plan on getting them treated so PLEASE DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP 😫

attributes.title: made my pet chinchilla very sick 🤢
attributes.review:
Fs in the chat for my chinchilla Rufus, he got into my coin collection last afternoon and found my phone. After opening this app he proceeded to vomit violently (Rufus is allergic to the color orange bc nothing rhymes with it) and he died seconds later. 
i rate this app 1 dead chinchilla outta 10 #riprufus #mommymissesu. 🥺

I downloaded this app just to see why people even download it soon to realize that the the app was so glitchy that it took over my whole phone I had to buy a new one I tried to contact the big Cheeto man but ofc all I got was a a naked picture of him in return PLEASE DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT COST ME A WHOLE NEW PHONE AND I HAD TO BLEACK MY EYES FROM THE HORRIFYING PHOTO😘

attributes.title: App glitches out as soon as you open it
attributes.review: The app keeps crashing! I’m wondering if it’s those gen-z kids hacking the app...or worse–CHINA! Very disappointed I can’t open the app at all to get tickets to events or hear news straight from Trump. Hoping Kanye will have a better app.
